410 AM CST MON JAN 19 2015

410 AM CST MON JAN 19 2015

...MODERATE FIRE DANGER TODAY...

THE GRASSLAND FIRE DANGER INDEX WILL BE IN THE MODERATE CATEGORY
THIS AFTERNOON.

MODERATE FIRE DANGER MEANS...ALTHOUGH CONTROLLED BURNING CAN BE
DONE WITHOUT CREATING A HAZARD...ROUTINE CAUTION SHOULD BE TAKEN.
